name: Inferior
overview: Inferior is a side-scrolling space shooter for up to two players. Moving constantly to the right the player must destroy or avoid numerous waves of incoming obstacles. The ship may be controlled in each direction. Being at the left edge of the screen, backing the ship slightly slow down the action. Each of five available ships can be improved between the zones, for example by mounting rapidly firing cannon, increasing maneuverability or speed. Each of three zones is divided into three individual stages.
